topics: First-stage rocket efficiency (reusable). Mission LEO 10–15 t. RP-1/LOX. Assumptions: Pc 10–25 MPa, MR 2.2–2.8. KPIs: higher T/W, lower Isp loss. DfAM: R≥0.7 mm, wall 1.2–1.6 mm, bridge≥35°. Validation: pump cold→combustor→nozzle wet w/ variable area.
LEAF71-style stability porting (1–5 kN methane/LOX). L* 0.8–1.2 m, swirl 0.4–0.8. Target: mode separation & pressure oscillation suppression. Include DfAM and sensor layout.
Low-noise propeller (8–12 inch, 4–6S, 2–3 kgf). Tip Mach ≤0.65, 55 dBA@1 m. Trade sweep/pitch/washout; AM hub integration.
Ramjet inlet, pick only 3 variables (Mach 2–4): external compression ratio, BL bleed rate, total pressure loss. Qualitative + rough quantitative trends.
“Pencil engine” booster→ramjet transition: state diagram (q, Mach, heat-release window), hysteresis/failsafe, HILS→ground transition tests.
